name: The Chase (itch) (Nikl, M1nd0fRafa3l)
description:
As a squirrel, you have set your eyes on an acorn, but it keeps falling deeper and deeper into a labyrinth. Follow it and finally call it yours.

Walk with arrow keys or WASD
Step on buttons to remove boulders on the map

If you have trouble with the browser version, please consider one of the native builds for Windows, Linux or macOS.
